text: ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), marginal (M), or no call (NC)
DETECTION P-VALUE = 'detection p-value', p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.text: Growth Description:  Plants are grown in 12 hr days in a growth chamber, 4 plants per round pot, 10 pots per flat.  Just before the plant sends bolts, they are inoculated.
Isolation of polysomal mRNA by ribosomal immunopurification

text: The MAS5.0 Normalization is performed using the justMAS function in the simpleaffy package of Bioconductor (www.bioconductor.org). The target value is 500 for all cases. The code was developed using R2.4.1, Bioconductor 1.9, and simpleaffy 2.8.0. The CDF files were downloaded from the Bioconductor website at
. The normalization scripts are available from the PLEXdb team by request.

protocol.text: Hot Phenol/Guanidine Thiocyanate and RNeasy Clean up
